reviewText:
Does not work in the U.S.A  how do I go about getting one that does.  Miami Hustle DVD
I rate the rest in the (5) Star area

this copy of the movie had some scenes edited out of it
the first time i saw this movie it had scenes in it that were not in this copy
maybe the scenes were removed to shorten the film or some one took them out on purpose
please let me know if there is a version of the movie in our region that is complete and not edited
the copy i got was in a foreign region also  thank you for any info
jfasc65119@aol.com
Why can't you see this movie in America?
I love the movie. Problem....you can't watch it in America. That should have been labeled a little bit more clearly. I would have never have purchased it if I knew that I could not use it.
The movie was very entertaining as I thought it would be.  The service in shipping was excellent.  I will buy more from this vendor.  I wish he would have sent a list of videos that he has for sale.
